name: In re: CONSTITUTIONALITY OF CANON 3, RULE 3.11 OF The CODE OF JUDICIAL CONDUCT
name_abbreviation: In re Constitutionality of Canon 3, Rule 3.11 of the Code of Judicial Conduct

parties: In re: CONSTITUTIONALITY OF CANON 3, RULE 3.11 OF The CODE OF JUDICIAL CONDUCT.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of March, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Supplemental Application for Extraordinary Relief is GRANTED, and the Application for Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
111 A.3d 167
In re: CONSTITUTIONALITY OF CANON 3, RULE 3.11 OF The CODE OF JUDICIAL CONDUCT.
No. 23 MM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 2, 2015.
